Trade/Device Name(s): BLE Smart Blood Glucose Monitoring System
BLE Smart Professional Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BLE Smart and BLE Smart Professional Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems with Bluetooth capability for quantitative glucose measurement.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary and venous whole blood from multiple sites; BLE Smart system for single-patient home use, BLE Smart Professional system for multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings as an aid in monitoring diabetes control.
